Description:
Ideal first, last or investment townhouse.
Easily maintained townhouse is an ideal choice for your first or last home.
Designed with comfort and convenience in mind, it offers three robed bedrooms or two bedrooms and a study with bi-fold doors opening off the living area.
There are two living areas, each with a split system unit for year-round comfort plus well-appointed kitchen and open meals/living area flowing seamlessly to a covered decked alfresco bringing the outdoors in and providing the ideal place to relax with family and friends.
Single carport and easy-care landscaping plus perfectly positioned a few minutes from shops, schools, childcare facilities and public transport.
Whether you're searching for a first home, looking to retire or secure a brilliant ready made investment property, this one ticks all the boxes.
Currently leased at $295.00 per week.
Insights: 17A John Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
A New Chapter Awaits
Leap into the market and begin your next chapter with this fantastic opportunity. With three generous sized bedrooms and a large living area, the lucky occupant will be able to enjoy the opportunity to indulge in the warm atmosphere that encompasses this 1950's home - turned modern. A functional kitchen adjoining the open plan living area offers a luxurious butlers pantry. With bright floating floors throughout, new paint and brand new carpets this home feels fresh as a daisy and ready for its new owner to live in and not have to worry about a thing. Brand new ducted gas heating and split system will keep you comfortable throughout the seasons and an abundance of storage will please. A neatly presented 490sqm block ensures lovely street presence and brand new fencing is an additional plus. The location oozes convenience with the ability to park your car under the secure, enclosed carport and walk to nearby Lansell Square. All tightly held within close proximity to schools, shops, cafes, freeway access and a wide range of public transport. This is a property which will appeal to a variety of buyers - don't miss it.
Insights: 344 High Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
MORE THAN MEETS THE EYE
Don't judge this one from the kerb, there's a lot more house than shows from the street.
It's a neat brick veneer family home with two living areas, four bedrooms, two bathrooms, double garage and a great yard for kids or pets.
The entry hall opens to both the L-shaped lounge/dining and the kitchen/family saving traffic in the formal areas. Galley-style kitchen features all-electric cooking appliances, a large pantry and dishwasher. The adjoining family area is the heart of the home with the fourth bedroom or study ideally located for use as a home office. All bedrooms feature built-in-robes and ceiling fans, the master includes a full ensuite and WIR.
All fittings are in excellent condition including gas heating and ducted air conditioning.
A paved and covered alfresco area off the family room is a great place for outdoor entertaining and overlooks the extensive rear yard complete with Colorbond shed/workshop with concrete floor and power and water connected. A double garage with auto-door, bitumen driveway and gated side access to the backyard for boat, caravan or trailer parking.
Perfect for first home buyers, downsizers or investors, the quiet court location is handy to Crusoe Reservoir for bush walks, Lansell Square for shopping and public transport for a ride to town.
Insights: 13 Julie Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Views of the Bush
Situated across the road from a lovely nature reserve and sitting on a block of 870sqm, this three bedroom home offers great privacy.
Designed with a simple floor plan, all three bedrooms are of a decent size and two feature built in robes. The bedrooms are serviced by the good sized central bathroom with large vanity, bath, shower and toilet. A large stylish kitchen is the central point of the home with dark stone bench tops and plenty of cupboard and bench space. It also features a 900mm stainless steel upright cooker with electric oven and gas stove top. Wrapping around the kitchen is the sizable L shaped lounge and dining room with windows along all walls letting light in from all angles.
A Braemar wall heater in the lounge acts as the heating for the home as well as evaporative cooling throughout.
Outside there is plenty of room for you to make this place your own. With a 6m x 6.5m shed/workshop in the back corner as well as a smaller garden shed and large double carport adjoining the house, there is plenty of parking and storage.
Currently leased at $300 per week with a tenancy agreement in place until October 2018.
Insights: 16 Yarunga Drive, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
OPPORTUNITY PLUS – GOOD SIZE HOUSE ON OVER AN ACRE!
Set in Kangaroo Flat is this solid AV Jennings Brick Veneer home. Offers 3 bedrooms all with Built in robes and main with ensuite, study or nursery, large family room with dado boards and large open fire place, open plan kitchen-meals area with double sliding doors to external large open entertaining area. Add to the list double garage with concrete floor, but the real WOW factor is the 4598 sqm allotment, a rectangle shape and could be utilised in many ways. Ideal for subdivision potential STCA, or plenty of room for that really, really big shed you could build on it, or just have lots of space in the back yard!! This property is great value with plenty of potential, also great spot and basically across the road from the Kangaroo Flat train station.

Description:
Immaculate Presentation
Set in a quiet street with a bush reserve back drop, this beautifully presented home close to all the benefits Kangaroo Flat has to offer will not last long. First impressions will make you smile as the garden is set up for easy maintenance and is a stand out in the street with a reputation for homes of quality. As you walk through the well-appointed home the carpets are near new and the layout is flexible with the master bedroom and lounge at the front, a second living space flows into the kitchen and dining with the remaining two bedrooms at the back of the home.
The build features include a double garage with auto door access and additional rear roller door, 1.5KW solar system with a 66c feed in tariff rate, master bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe, ceiling fans throughout plus ducted evaporative cooling and a highly functional kitchen with an Asco dishwasher, 4 burner gas hotplates, electric oven and double sink overlooking the garden.
The private back yard is screened from neighbours with foliage and there is a concreted and powered shed measuring approximately 6mtrs x 7mtrs connected to tanks holding and distributing 9000 litres of water around the immaculate garden that is there to enjoy but not that hard to maintain with artificial turf being laid several years ago. Located with a bus stop at the end of the street (on Helm Street), the home is walking distance to Kangaroo Flat Community Health, train station and main street while also a short drive to Centro Lansell and Crusoe Reservoir.
Insights: 15 Peace Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
As fresh as a new bloom.
No need to lift a finger here, this well-located weatherboard home has been completely renovated with a fresh new look and is now a neat and comfortable home to suit young families, downsizers or investors.
Light fills the front rooms including large lounge adjoining the kitchen/dining area. New kitchen includes timber-topped island bench/breakfast bar, stainless steel gas cooker, dishwasher, pantry/appliance cupboard and tiled floors with ducted heating and cooling circulating throughout.
The versatile floor plan provides for four bedrooms or three and a study. Three have robes including the main which also has convenient two-way access to the bathroom and sliding door to the rear verandah. New laundry off rear vestibule incorporates shower and 2nd toilet.
Full length timber-decked rear verandah makes the perfect outdoor living and entertaining zone overlooking the neat landscaped back yard while an external, fully lined 3.2m x 5.8m bungalow can be used for another bedroom, teen retreat, studio, gym or work-from home space.
But there's more - a garden shed/workshop and carport with roller door.
Great location – a short walk to Kangaroo Flat schools, shops, sporting facilities and public transport. Call for an inspection today!

Description:
Space and Function in a Great Location
There are few low maintenance homes that are finished with such great use of space and comes with a shed of this size (7x4). Boasting 4 sizeable bedrooms with built in robes, main bedroom with ensuite and walk in robe plus 2 open plan and light filled living areas with ducted heating and evaporative cooling throughout.
The living areas have sliding door access to the fantastic protected outdoor area which is ideal for entertaining and alfresco dining. The kitchen is also a fantastic feature of the home, boasting high-quality stainless steel appliances including a 900mm stainless steel oven with gas cook top, dishwasher, great sized pantry, breakfast bar and a terrific sense of space with outdoor views.
Ideal for the young family or equally appealing to an investor with its low maintenance backyard, with fantastic timber retaining walls which frame the alfresco area. The double garage is a good size with remote access and interior access to the home.
This incredible home has a stunning street appeal, set in a quiet court, walking distance to the local primary school, so close to local shopping centres, train/bus stations and just an hour and half to Melbourne.
If you are looking for a quality family home with all the creature comforts then an inspection is a must.

Description:
DON'T MISS THIS ONE
Great first home or investment property! look at this neat brick veneer home. Things like affordability, low maintenance and the big block will instantly lift your spirits.
The home offers three bedrooms, all with robes and ceiling fans and a three-piece bathroom with handy two-way access to both the main bedroom and hallway.
Living is easy with a spacious lounge equipped with gas heating and split system air conditioner adjoining the roomy kitchen, meals and family living areas. Cooking for the family will be a breeze with the gas cooktop/electric wall oven combination, pantry cupboard and island breakfast bar for casual meals.
Glass doors from the meals/family slide back to reveal a covered alfresco area overlooking the family-friendly backyard where there's plenty of room for weekend cricket or footy matches and it's safe and secured for toddlers or pets with lock-up gates from the double carport and Colorbond fencing all round.
Situated close to Kangaroo Flat shopping strip, public transport, schools and public recreation facilities.
Great for first time home owners, investors, improvers or downsizers.

Description:
Quiet Convenience
An impressive, well maintained home that will tick all the boxes. Perfect for retirees or professionals, purposefully set up to be locked up and left secure.
An open plan living/dining /kitchen area, spacious bedrooms with built in robes, plenty of storage. Split system heating and cooling plus undercover alfresco and the bonus of a double lock up garage. Close to shops and public transport. What more do you need!
A benchtop divides the well-equipped kitchen from the dining area. It offers stainless steel appliances including 4 burner gas hot plates, 600mm electric wall oven, double sink, dishwasher and a pantry. The meals and family area has sliding door access to the alfresco.
Two bedrooms with built-in wardrobes, a family bathroom and separate toilet.
The main bedroom has a walk-in wardrobe and three-piece en suite, it’s at the front of the home and can be closed off for privacy.
Within walking distance to all amenities, including bus and train services, doctors, schools, sporting complexes, parks, entertainment and conveniently located between Kangaroo Flat CBD and Lansell Square.

Description:
Position and Potential!
Bendigo Property Plus is proud to present this lovely three-bedroom home on a 613sqm block a mere stones throw away from all the conveniences of Kangaroo Flat CBD.
This classic design has the three bedrooms on the right hand side, bathroom and laundry at the back and living areas on the left. The entrance hall welcomes you with the lounge room to the left. The adjoining open plan kitchen and dining room offers a lovely space for families to convene. The kitchen has a good amount of bench space, plenty of cupboards, drawers and pantry storage. There’s also a double sink and a free standing 600mm electric cooker.
The bedrooms are well sized – two have built-in-robes. The four-piece bathroom has a vanity, shower over the bath and toilet. The laundry has extra storage and is located near the backdoor. There is a handy second toilet at the end of the laundry. The sunroom is a fabulous second living area, perfectly positioned overlooking the alfresco and backyard.
Outside, the fully fenced yard has a covered entertaining area, lawn spaces for children and a separate fenced off area that could be used for pets or a separate garden area. There is a single car lock up garage with concrete floor and power.
Notable Features:
# Brand new Colorbond roof
# Floorboards in hallways, living, dining and kitchen areas
# Bedrooms have carpet, wet areas have vinyl
# Ducted evaporative air conditioning and ducted gas heating
# Recently painted on the outside
# Walking distance to Kangaroo Flat CBD
If you're seeking a property within close proximity to all amenities including bus and train services, doctors, schools, sporting complexes, parks and entertainment, then you could not be in a better spot on the Melbourne side of Bendigo.
Inspections are most welcome, so call today to arrange a viewing of this lovely home.

Description:
Lakeside Foreshore Living
On Forest Lake foreshore, this luxurious home boasts a most privileged position with uninterrupted water views.
It is a builder’s-own home which combines superior quality with individual floor plan and boutique features.
“We fell in love with the home’s floor plan,” the current owners said. “All the living areas, including the outdoor deck, are north-facing and overlook the lake.
“The kitchen was another highlight for us, we’re passionate about cooking and we can watch the water while preparing dinner.”
Family living is truly spacious with banquet-style dining as well as casual meals and relaxed sitting space.
Nearby is a separate lounge which makes a fabulous home theatre.
The chef-quality kitchen offers full-length island, fitted pantry, recipe station, Blanco dishwasher and 900mm-wide Westinghouse dual-fuel cooker.
More features in this light-filled home are French doors, custom-made retractable screens, genuine hardwood floors and designer-inspired bathrooms.
The home has four bedrooms with fitted storage including parents’ retreat with double doors, walk-through robe and deluxe two-person ensuite
Central heating, ducted cooling, walk-in storage, fab laundry, data cabling and multi-room on-demand television are family essentials.
The fully-landscaped allotment (about 750sq.m) has a double auto-garage, secure fencing, twin gates, trailer bay, rainwater storage, produce garden and mini-orchard.
“We will miss the lifestyle—dinner parties on the deck, nibbles and a drink after work.”
A cherished home (and a reluctant sale) in a tranquil setting with easy access to major shopping outlets, schools, parkland and public transport.
Insights: 94 Queen Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Little luxurious masterpiece
• One bedroom masterpiece
• Ceiling fan and three door built in robe
• Study
• Perfect for a single person or couple
• Stone bench tops, excellent storage space
• Electric hotplates and under bench electric oven
• Timber laminate flooring, carpet and tiles
• Split system to large living area
• Tiled bathroom with shower, vanity and toilet
• Great space saving Euro style Laundry
• Single carport
• Japanese inspired garden with garden shed and water tank for toilet
• All electric appliances
• Low maintenance
• NBN
Acquire an exceptionally rare type of modern property. Presented as new, being completed just less than 12 months ago. One of six units, located in a private setting, tucked away at the end of a long driveway. Flooded with natural light. Live in or lease out. Opportunity to offer an ‘in demand’ investment property to a market, in which supply is very low. Or live it up in a little luxury and style yourself! Anticipated rent of $220 per week.
Insights: 6/21 John Street, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2014.

Description:
Magnificent Inside and Out
Stunning and designed to impress is this modern, 4 bedroom family home that offers so much, in a location where you will appreciate the value and benefits this home presents.
Elevated with views off the back undercover, timber-decked entertaining area, you have a birds-eye view of so much.
Cathedral ceilings and square set decorative alcoves in the entrance gives you a hint of what's to come, with earthy neutral tones through the home, giving it a soothing feel.
Formal living to the front gives you all the peace and privacy one may need, and polished floorboards grace the split level living areas.
The huge open-plan kitchen, meals and family room takes you directly to the entertaining area.
Kitchen with storage and “A” class fixtures and fittings.
This house is generously proportioned and very well laid out, with ample room for the family in the rest of the house, where you will find the main bedroom with ensuite and walk-in robe, and three more double bedrooms (all with built-in robes), a purpose-built study, and a gorgeous family bathroom with a double shower, bath and double vanity.
Ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling provides cost efficient comfort all year round, while electricity and water costs are offset by a 3kw Solar system and a 3000 litre water tank.
This is a dream home waiting for an appreciative, comfort-loving owner to move in and put their feet up!
Minutes to so many amenities and on the perfect side of the Calder Highway and train station to commute to Melbourne.
Insights: 16 Irrabella Place, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 44 other 4 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.

Description:
Ready to live in or refresh!
In the private and peaceful court in the heart of Kangaroo Flat, Baslar Court is home to a fantastic property. With a large backyard with plenty of opportunities to expand and room to renovate inside, this one is one that would please many. Close to everything Kangaroo Flat has to offer, including Bunnings, Lansell Square, Woolworths and Coles, Kangaroo Flat train station along with many parks and walking trails, this home is in a perfect location.
Inside, you will a generous living area with a kitchen equipped with great bench and cupboard space and a large pantry. The living area would be a great space to relax with beautiful floorboards lining the floor and the added comfort of ducted heating and cooling.
All 3 bedrooms are a generous size and all feature built in robes and the family bathroom is complete with vanity and shower bath. The opportunity to refresh and renovate this property is there or if you simply just want to move in and live comfortably then that is an option to.
Outside is one of the major assets of the property. There is a huge amount of yard space which welcomes the option to expand the property or decorate and landscape the yard. Perfect for all the tools or gardening equipment is the garden shed and decorating the yard is various plants and trees. You won't find many other properties with this kind of land size in the Kangaroo Flat area!
A property with plenty of potential in the heart of bustling suburb Kangaroo Flat won't stick around for long. Contact the Ray White team for your first look.
Insights: 1 Baslar Court, Kangaroo Flat VIC 3555 was last sold in 2018 and 137 other 3 bedroom house in Kangaroo Flat have recently been sold.
